nodes.text: Daynar Corsh was a male human active in the Anoat sector of the galaxy during shortly after the death of Galactic Emperor Palpatine. A criminal, he was known to interrogate individuals for gang leaders and crime lords, getting information from difficult beings. Preferring the use of a blaster pistol and to work in stealth, he was also skilled at recovering material.
A smuggler who opposed the Empire recruited Corsh, sending him on various missions in the sector.

Daynar Corsh was a crew member obtainable by players of the 2015 mobile game Star Wars: Uprising, by entertainment company Kabam. He is initially a 2-star Tier-I crew member, upgrading to a maximum 4-star level. His background is criminal, preference is stealth and has the scavenger ability, making him strong in material finder runs. He wears Hutt guard gear and carries a blaster pistol.
